T02D3545:182a-1: shu kl'u pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3545:182a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3545:182a-4: 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3545:182a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas rang gi snying gar
T02D3545:182a-6: chu skyes dkar po dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D3545:182a-7: phyir yig dkar po rnam par bkod pa la de
T02D3545:182a-8: bzhin du sngon ma bzhin du thams cad bya'o //
T02D3545:182a-9: pram yig dang padma yongs su gyur pa las bcom
T02D3545:182a-10: ldan 'das ma sku mdog dkar mo zhal gcig phyag
T02D3545:182a-11: gnyis pa lung dang rtogs pa'i gzugs can ma /
T02D3545:182a-12: rin po che'i cod pan bsnams pa /
T02D3545:182a-13: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pustis mtshan
T02D3545:182a-14: pa'i chu skyes gnyis g-yon dang g-yas kyi logs ngag
T02D3545:182a-15: gi nang du langs ba bsnams pa'i phyag dag gis
T02D3545:182a-16: chos 'chad pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
T02D3545:182a-17: padma dkar po dang zla ba la rdo rje skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3545:182a-18: lang tsho gzhon zhing dar la bab pa /
T02D3545:182a-19: na bza' dang rgyan rnam pa sna chogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D3545:182a-20: so sor snang ba tsam rab tu 'phro ba'i sna
T02D3545:182a-21: tshogs pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam mkha' gang
T02D3545:182a-22: ba / mar me'i phreng ba lta bu thogs pa
T02D3545:182a-23: med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D3545:182a-24: dpag tu med pa spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor bas
T02D3545:182a-25: thams cad rang bzhin gcig tu lhag par mos pas
T02D3545:182a-26: ji srid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma
T02D3545:182a-27: mngon du ma gyur pa de srid du bsgom par
T02D3545:182a-28: ba / bya'o // de nas gang gi tshe dgong
T02D3545:182a-29: bar gyur na padma dkar po sna'i rtse mor tsa
T02D3545:182a-30: na ka'i tshad tsam kun nas bris pa bzhin du
T02D3545:182a-32: de la bzhugs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3545:182a-33: phyin ma shin tu phra bar gsungs pa'i gzungs la
T02D3545:182a-34: rtse gcig pa'i yid kyis yang dang yang du mngon
T02D3545:182a-35: du bya zhing bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3545:182a-36: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyi sngags ni aom khram sv'a h'a /
T02D3545:182a-37: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs la ni //
T02D3545:182a-38: sngags med don dam rim pa'o //
T02D3545:182a-39: shes rab pha rol phyin ma yi //
T02D3545:182a-40: man ngag thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D3545:182a-41: dge 'dun byin gyi bu yis ni //
T02D3545:182a-42: rigs kyi ming gis kyang 'bad nas //
T02D3545:182b-0: sems can kun gyi don @182b phyir du //
T02D3545:182b-1: sgrub thabs gsal po 'di bris so //
T02D3545:182b-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dkar mo'i
